p: Through the WHO country office, funding for the IDSR training was mobilised from various partners and initiatives including the UK-aid Department for International Development (DFID), WHO-AFRO, the continuum of care for Reproductive Maternal Newborn Adolescent and Child Health (RMANCH), USAID, the Global Polio Eradication Initiative (GPEI) and the Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF) (Table 1).
